channel.title: Need help adding a shout box on vbulletin
channel.description:
Hi I am trying to add a shout box but am having a problem with it. I have transferred all the files that the instructions said to upload via a FTP client (FillaZilla) then edited the permissions like it said to and now I go to add the shout box by uploading the .xml file and it says this. http://gyazo.com/0df91a7360fcbbc981c9b96a6d351207 and the file that it's saying is here like it is meant to be. http://gyazo.com/fac2833d26548a10ef4e73009a84e13d
Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help adding a shout box on vbulletin
item.dc:creator: @Blue_Mar1ne Blue Mar1ne
item.description:
@Blue_Mar1ne wrote:

I just added it to public_html. Which one am I suppose to add it to?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding a shout box on vbulletin

item.title: Need help adding a shout box on vbulletin
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You uploaded the files to the wrong directory by the looks of it. Inside your webhost there are usually many directories, it might have just been that you missed on out. Go back and check

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding a shout box on vbulletin
